sql.content: SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.编码)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.编码)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.姓名)) AS userTrueName ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.姓名)) AS userName ,'HR' AS userType ,LEFT(LTRIM(A.姓名) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.性别)) AS sex ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.部门)) AS groupName ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.联系电话)) AS tel ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.籍贯)) AS city ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(100) ,GETDATE() ,120) AS lastTime FROM HR_JBXXB A ORDER BY 1

SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_PerNo)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_PerNo)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_Pername)) AS userTrueName ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_Pername)) AS userName ,'HR' AS userType ,LEFT(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_Pername)) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_CardNo)) AS cardNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_Tel)) AS tel ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_Tel)) AS loginName ,'F16712F527E1AC92D2C4868DDD16AFE9' AS loginPwd ,A.Base_Modify_DateTime AS lastTime FROM General_Personnel A ,General_Group B WHERE A.Base_GroupID = B.Base_GroupID AND A.Base_IsDel = 0 AND B.Base_IsDel = 0 ORDER BY 1

SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) AS userName ,LEFT(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.uname)) AS loginName ,A.pwd AS loginPwd ,A.updateTime AS lastTime FROM Sys_User A WHERE A.job_Number IS NOT NULL AND A.job_Number != '' AND A.deleted = 0 ORDER BY 1

SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) AS userName ,LEFT(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) AS loginName ,A.pwd AS loginPwd ,A.updateTime AS lastTime FROM Sys_User A WHERE A.job_Number IS NOT NULL AND A.job_Number != '' AND A.deleted = 0 ORDER BY 1

SELECT 'uid=' || A.UserNo || ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,A.UserNo AS userNo ,A.UserName AS userName ,SUBSTR(A.UserName ,1 ,1) AS surname ,A.UserID AS loginName ,A.UserPW AS loginPwd FROM AAUserData A WHERE A.UserNo IS NOT NULL AND A.UserStatus = 'A' ORDER BY 1
SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_PerNo)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_PerNo)) AS userNo ,A.openID AS openID FROM Users A WHERE openID IS NOT NULL
